bug.author: korabelnikov
bug.summary: Find (ctrl+f) has broken in the 'custom network' form
bug.description:
branch:master (yesterday checkout) It'works before when I used version 4.1.
crtrl+f does not action now
<denchmark-link:https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3808833/20249350/0ec21792-aa11-11e6-9706-77f69246d0cd.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Confirmed. When I moved stuff around in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/NVIDIA/DIGITS/pull/1201>#1201</denchmark-link> , I broke Ace's auto-loading feature. In <denchmark-link:https://github.com/NVIDIA/DIGITS/pull/1271>#1271</denchmark-link> , I load this extension explicitly.
